<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heatwave](/Feats.aspx?ID=2558) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Trigger**
An effect would deal fire damage to you, even if you resist all the damage.

</column>

---

You harness the oncoming flames and twist them into a screen of heat and smoke, granting you [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Heatwave
